name: ebony
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a very hard dark wood of a tropical tree, used especially for making furniture: He started buying exotic woods such as ebony and rosewood from Mexico. The handles of medical instruments used to be made of ebony. Compare
jet black
coal black
Chonticha Vatpongpee/EyeEm/GettyImages
[ C or U ] one of several types of tropical tree whose hard dark wood is used for making furniture: The horticulturalist Pierre Poivre introduced species from around the world, including fruit and spice trees, ebony and mahogany.
LITERARY the colour black: skin of gleaming ebony
Pakin Songmor/Moment/GettyImages
